I have recently compiled bitcoin v0.14.1 from source and was trying to develop some applications using testnet, but whenever i use bitcoind commnand within 10 sec this error happes. Please help me out
I'm on google compute engine with n-standard-1 type CPU.
title: EXCEPTION: N5boost16exception_detail10clone_implINS0_19error_info_injectorINS_21thread_resource_errorEEEEE        boost::thread_resource_error: Resource temporarily unavailable        bitcoin in AppInit()
